segments.text: I notice the girl reaching up, her palm open, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she’s been waiting for this moment all day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and I’m worried he’s going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she trusts him completely, even though he’s not very steady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying that plate, completely unaware of the chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the excitement in the air, like they’re about to pull off the perfect cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still pouring out of the sink, but it’s like they don’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the boy will share the cookies or keep them all for himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so full of energy, even with the water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how determined they both look.
segments.speaker: PAR
